com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.security

Class SCUISecurityResponse

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.security.SCUISecurityResponse

  • public class SCUISecurityResponse
extends java.lang.Object
    Response class is the holder for the authentication or post authentication response status and forwardURL.
    If the authentication or post authentication succeeds the returnStatus is set to SCUISecurityResponse.SUCCESS and the forwardURL is null.
    Otherwise the returnStatus is set to SCUISecurityResponse.FAILURE, forwardURL is set to URL the request should be forwarded to. rasrinivasan

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean FAILURE 
      static boolean SUCCESS 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SCUISecurityResponse()
      Creates a new SCUISecurityResponse with default returnStatus of SCUISecurityResponse.SUCCESS (true) and null forwardURL.
      SCUISecurityResponse(boolean returnStatus, java.lang.String forwardURL)
      Creates a new SCUISecurityResponse with given returnStatus and forwardURL.
      If the returnStatus is set to SCUISecurityResponse.SUCCESS, then the returnStatus will have the boolean value true and no forwardURL is expected.
      If the returnStatus is set to SCUISecurityResponse.FAILURE, then the returnStatus will have the boolean value false and forwardURL can be specified for forwarding the request.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getErrorMessage() 
      java.lang.String getForwardURL() 
      boolean getReturnStatus() 
      java.lang.Exception getSecurityException() 
      boolean isRedirect()
      True if the response has to be redirected to the URL.
      void setErrorMessage(java.lang.String errorMessage) 
      void setForwardURL(java.lang.String forwardURL)
      If the return status is not set to SCUISecurityResponse.SUCCESS (true) then the framework forwards to the URL set by this method.
      void setRedirect(boolean redirect) 
      void setReturnStatus(boolean returnStatus)
      returnStatus can be set to any boolean value depending on the status and handled in the redirected page.
      If this return status is not set to SCUISecurityResponse.SUCCESS (true) then the framework forwards to the URL set by setForwardURL.
      returnStatus
      void setSecurityException(java.lang.Exception securityException)
